title: I have really bad fps all of a sudden
body: I tried lowering the graphics, closing background programs, uninstalling then re installing the game, and using the old client, and nothing helped

replies.body: Did you recently patch to the updated client?  It's possible that some game files have gone bad and causing fps issues, but there could be other problems too.  I recommend going over the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help!  Let me know if you have any questions!
